analysis.description:
BasicToken.totalSupply_ (/unique_chucks/7/0xdf0456311751799f7036b373cdb6f6dfde04e3b6.sol#144-145) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- totalSupply (/unique_chucks/7/0xdf0456311751799f7036b373cdb6f6dfde04e3b6.sol#151-152)

Reentrancy in ICO.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/7/0xdf0456311751799f7036b373cdb6f6dfde04e3b6.sol#551-569):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(lmda.balanceOf(address(this)) > 0) (/unique_chucks/7/0xdf0456311751799f7036b373cdb6f6dfde04e3b6.sol#553-554)
	- lmda.transfer(_addr,toTransfer) (/unique_chucks/7/0xdf0456311751799f7036b373cdb6f6dfde04e3b6.sol#564-565)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/7/0xdf0456311751799f7036b373cdb6f6dfde04e3b6.sol#565-566)

ICO.ICO (/unique_chucks/7/0xdf0456311751799f7036b373cdb6f6dfde04e3b6.sol#465-492) does not use the value returned by external calls:
